author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sri Venkateshwaraa Medical College Hospital and Research Centre has launched a super specialty out patient department.

R. Radhakrishnan, MP, opened the facility which will help patients to access care in cardiology, neurology, nephrology, gastroenterology, urology, neurosurgery, oncology and diabetology.

The hospital will have registration, billing, sample collection, investigations and specialist consultation under one roof. Soon, an evening OPD and Sunday consultation session with facility for a master health check up is to be launched shortly.

Dr. K.V. Raman, Health director and B. Ramachandran, chairman of the Venkateshwaraa group also participated.
title: Hospital opens super speciality OP department
